languages.text: {n}Перед вами, возможно, самые отвратительные обитатели отсека — они покрыты язвами, проплешины блестят гноем, а смрад немытых тел вышибает слезу. Один из них смотрит исподлобья и шипит:{/n} "Надо чего?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Перед вами, возможно, самые отвратительные обитатели отсека — они покрыты язвами, проплешины блестят гноем, а смрад немытых тел вышибает слезу. Один из них смотрит исподлобья и шипит.{/n} "Чего уставил{mf|ся|ась}?"

languages.text: {n}The specimens before you must be the most repellent inhabitants in the compartment — they are covered in sores and bald patches glistening with pus, and the stench of unwashed bodies brings a tear to your eye. One of them glowers at you and grunts,{/n} "Wotcha want?"
languages.original_text: {n}Перед вами, возможно, самые отвратительные обитатели отсека — они покрыты язвами, проплешины блестят гноем, а смрад немытых тел вышибает слезу. Один из них смотрит исподлобья и шипит:{/n} "Надо чего?"

traits.locale_text: {n}The specimens before you must be the most repellent inhabitants in the compartment — they are covered in sores and bald patches glistening with pus, and the stench of unwashed bodies brings a tear to your eye. One of them glowers at you and grunts,{/n} "Wotcha want?"

{n}The specimens before you must be the most repellent inhabitants in the compartment — they are covered in sores and bald patches glistening with pus, and the stench of unwashed bodies brings a tear to your eye. One of them glowers at you and grunts,{/n} "Wotcha want?"

{n}The specimens before you must be the most repellent inhabitants in the compartment — they are covered in sores and bald patches glistening with pus, and the stench of unwashed bodies brings a tear to your eye. One of them glowers at you and grunts,{/n} "Wotcha want?"

{n}The specimens before you must be the most repellent inhabitants in the compartment — they are covered in sores and bald patches glistening with pus, and the stench of unwashed bodies brings a tear to your eye. One of them glowers at you and grunts,{/n} "Wotcha want?"

{n}The specimens before you must be the most repellent inhabitants in the compartment — they are covered in sores and bald patches glistening with pus, and the stench of unwashed bodies brings a tear to your eye. One of them glowers at you and grunts,{/n} "Wotcha want?"

languages.text: {n}Los especímenes que tienes ante ti son sin duda los moradores más repulsivos del compartimento: están cubiertos de llagas y sarpullidos que rezuman pus, y el hedor de sus cuerpos mugrientos es tan irritante que se te saltan las lágrimas. Uno de ellos te mira con el ceño fruncido y gruñe:{/n} «¿Qué quiere?».
languages.original_text: {n}The specimens before you must be the most repellent inhabitants in the compartment — they are covered in sores and bald patches glistening with pus, and the stench of unwashed bodies brings a tear to your eye. One of them glowers at you and grunts,{/n} "Wotcha want?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Los especímenes que tienes ante ti son sin duda los moradores más repulsivos del compartimento: están cubiertos de llagas y sarpullidos que rezuman pus, y el hedor de sus cuerpos mugrientos es tan irritante que se te saltan las lágrimas. Uno de ellos te mira con el ceño fruncido y gruñe:{/n} «¿Qué quiere?».

languages.text: {n}目の前の生き物は、この区画で最も嫌な住人に違いない。彼らはただれ、膿で光るハゲに覆われ、洗っていない死体の悪臭が涙を誘う。そのうちの一人があなたをにらみつけ、こう唸る。{/n}「何が望みだ？」
languages.original_text: {n}The specimens before you must be the most repellent inhabitants in the compartment — they are covered in sores and bald patches glistening with pus, and the stench of unwashed bodies brings a tear to your eye. One of them glowers at you and grunts,{/n} "Wotcha want?"

traits.locale_text: {n}目の前の生き物は、この区画で最も嫌な住人に違いない。彼らはただれ、膿で光るハゲに覆われ、洗っていない死体の悪臭が涙を誘う。そのうちの一人があなたをにらみつけ、こう唸る。{/n}「何が望みだ？」

languages.text: {n}毫无疑问，你眼前的这群家伙，肯定是这片区域最令人生厌的住民。他们浑身脓疮，裸露在外的皮肤上覆满了脓液。由于长期不洗澡，他们身上臭气熏天，熏得你眼泪都要流出来了。其中一个人对你怒目而视，嘟囔着开了口。{/n}“你想干啥？”
languages.original_text: {n}The specimens before you must be the most repellent inhabitants in the compartment — they are covered in sores and bald patches glistening with pus, and the stench of unwashed bodies brings a tear to your eye. One of them glowers at you and grunts,{/n} "Wotcha want?"

traits.locale_text: {n}毫无疑问，你眼前的这群家伙，肯定是这片区域最令人生厌的住民。他们浑身脓疮，裸露在外的皮肤上覆满了脓液。由于长期不洗澡，他们身上臭气熏天，熏得你眼泪都要流出来了。其中一个人对你怒目而视，嘟囔着开了口。{/n}“你想干啥？”

languages.text: {n}Die Leute vor dir müssen die abstoßendsten Bewohner des Moduls sein ... sie sind von eiternden Geschwüren bedeckt und ihre ungewaschenen Leiber lassen deine Augen tränen. Einer von ihnen mustert dich und grunzt:{/n} "Was wollt Ihr?"
languages.original_text: {n}The specimens before you must be the most repellent inhabitants in the compartment — they are covered in sores and bald patches glistening with pus, and the stench of unwashed bodies brings a tear to your eye. One of them glowers at you and grunts,{/n} "Wotcha want?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Leute vor dir müssen die abstoßendsten Bewohner des Moduls sein ... sie sind von eiternden Geschwüren bedeckt und ihre ungewaschenen Leiber lassen deine Augen tränen. Einer von ihnen mustert dich und grunzt:{/n} "Was wollt Ihr?"

languages.text: {n}Les spécimens qui se tiennent devant vous sont sans doute les habitants les plus repoussants du compartiment : couverts de chancres et de pelades suintant le pus, ils dégagent une odeur de crasse telle que vous en avez les larmes aux yeux. L'un d'entre eux vous adresse un regard noir et grogne :{/n} « Vous voulez quoi ? »
languages.original_text: {n}The specimens before you must be the most repellent inhabitants in the compartment — they are covered in sores and bald patches glistening with pus, and the stench of unwashed bodies brings a tear to your eye. One of them glowers at you and grunts,{/n} "Wotcha want?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Les spécimens qui se tiennent devant vous sont sans doute les habitants les plus repoussants du compartiment : couverts de chancres et de pelades suintant le pus, ils dégagent une odeur de crasse telle que vous en avez les larmes aux yeux. L'un d'entre eux vous adresse un regard noir et grogne :{/n} « Vous voulez quoi ? »

languages.text: {n}Önünde duran tuhaf tipler, kompartımanın en mide bulandırıcı sakinleri olmalı. Her yanlarını yara bere kaplamış, açıkta kalan yerleri irinle parıldıyor. Yıkanmamış bedenlerinin leş gibi kokusu ise gözünden yaş getiriyor. Bir tanesi sana ters ters bakarak homurdanıyor.{/n} "Ne istiyorsun?"
languages.original_text: {n}The specimens before you must be the most repellent inhabitants in the compartment — they are covered in sores and bald patches glistening with pus, and the stench of unwashed bodies brings a tear to your eye. One of them glowers at you and grunts,{/n} "Wotcha want?"
